title.rendered: Yoga Mat Padded Non Slip 15mm Thick NBR Exercise Mats

content.rendered:
Colour Black
Brand Xn8 Sports
Material Nitrile Butadiene Rubber Foam
Product care instructions Hand Wash Only
Product dimensions 4.65L x 1.55W x 0.04Th metres
Item weight 1.1 Kilograms

About this item

  • A high-quality, hard-wearing, and comfortable yoga mat is all you need to get started with your yoga training at home or outside. One such is the Xn8 Sports NBR yoga mat that outshines others both in aesthetics and performance. Material is plush but firm that’s why your body doesn’t sink into it completely.
  • Its generous 15mm cushioning provides outstanding protection to your knees, elbows, feet, and other parts of the body, particularly, when you are practicing the difficult yoga pose. It is 183 cm long and 61 cm wide. Light as a thinner mat but very comfortable!
  • We have crafted our lightweight and non-slip workout mat with the premium quality NBR material that assures its durability and longevity plus it is skin-friendly. You can use it for a variety of physical activities, both indoor and outdoor, and it flattens out in few minutes, plus it stays put on wooden floors as well.
  • We know how inconvenient it can get sometimes to travel with your exercise mat, that’s why we have adroitly designed this yoga mat to be light-weighted. Plus, it also comes with a carrying strap that makes its transportation super easy.
  • You can bring home our training mat in one of your favourite colours as we have few vibrant options available. Further, if you are not happy with this or any of our other items, feel free to contact our professional yet friendly customer care.
